DOC.brief_summary: Study determine sunscreen protection factor ( SPF ) ultraviolet A protection factor ( PFA ) 2 sunscreen product contain combination zinc oxide avobenzone without ensulizole .
DOC.brief_title: Determination Sun Protection Sunscreen Formulas ( Study SR09-15 ) ( P08236 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: 18 70 year age Have Fitzpatrick skin type I , II , III In good general health base medical history review Be free acute chronic illness/disease might interfere increase risk study participation Be able cooperate investigator research staff Be willing test material apply accord protocol Be capable understanding provide write informed consent Subjects history adverse effect upon sun exposure Subjects currently take medication may alter sunlight response know photosensitizer Subjects history form cancer , lupus , psoriasis , rosacea , porphyria cutanea tarda , connective tissue disease , diabetes disease would increase risk associate study participation Subjects abnormal sensitivity sunscreen agent Females indicate pregnant nursing infant period study Subjects excessive hair , blemish , nevi , wart , mole , scar , sunburn , suntan uneven pigmentation test area Subjects administered investigation drug participate another SPF PFA study within 30 day prior study Subjects allergic latex latex product Subjects condition would make study participation inappropriate determine investigator
